level.heading: Weekly reports by commissioner of finance to mayor and comptroller.
level.text: ยง 11-106 Weekly reports by commissioner of finance to mayor and comptroller. The commissioner of finance shall once in each week report in writing to the mayor and to the comptroller all moneys received by the commissioner, the amount of all warrants paid by him or her since the commissioner's last report, and the amount remaining to the credit of the city.
